mapper.insert: insert into job_stop (stop_id, job_id, created_user_id, created_time, refund, content, status) values (#{stopId}, #{jobId}, #{createdUserId}, #{createdTime}, #{refund}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select: select job_stop.ids, stop_id, job_stop.job_id, title as job_title, created_user_id, create_user.real_name as created_user_name, job_stop.created_time, refund, content, job_stop.status, read_time, process_time, process_user_id, process_user.real_name as process_user_name, process_remark, process_read_time from job_stop left join job on job_stop.job_id=job.job_id left join user_info create_user on created_user_id=user_id left join user_info process_user on process_user_id=process_user.user_id where stop_id=#{stopId}
mapper.update:
update job_stop
refund=#{refund},
content=#{content},
status=#{status},
read_time=#{readTime},
process_time=#{processTime},
process_user_id=#{processUserId},
